text: Mu by’ukuri ba bandi bemeye (Allah n’intumwa ye Muhamadi), Abayahudi (abemeye ubutumwa bwa Musa ku gihe cye), Abaswaabi’i (abagumye kuri kamere yabo batagize idini bayoboka), Abanaswara [abemeye ubutumwa bwa Issa (Yesu) ku gihe cye], Abamajusi (abasenga umuriro) ndetse n’abasenga ibindi bitari Allah; rwose Allah azabakiranura ku munsi w’imperuka. Mu by’ukuri Allah ni Umuhamya uhebuje wa buri kintu
